title: Home
text:

Feel free to browse around and see what I’m up to!
No don’t take this serious
Yes I mean what I write here

title: About
text:
I live in the terminal.
I am a Free and Open Source Software (FOSS) enthusiast.
Neovim is my home.
I love exploring new programming languages.

title: About
text:
Introduction
Hey there! I’m Mathis, a Dev from Germany. I specialize in backend development with PHP and Python. Right now, I’m diving into Golang. Professional Background
I’ve got a ton of experience with PHP, especially in Laravel and Symfony, doing the full stack thing in both. Lately, I’ve been messing around with Golang, making CLI tools to make dev life suck less. In my free time, and when I should have been paying attention in class, I’ve played with a bunch of other programming languages, with a soft spot for Python.
So, yeah, that’s me. Poke around if you’re curious.
